byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY and MITCH SMITH

lead_paragraph: The state attorney general, who opened an investigation into the water system that exposed residents to elevated levels of lead, will hold a news conference in Flint on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Official Investigating Water Crisis in Flint Will Hold News Conference
headline.main: Michigan Official Plans ‘Significant Announcement’ in Flint Water Inquiry

snippet: The state attorney general, who opened an investigation into the water system that exposed residents to elevated levels of lead, will hold a news conference in Flint on Wednesday.
abstract: Michigan Atty Gen Bill Schuette announces plans to appear with state investigators and prosecutor involved in inquiry into Flint's water contamination crisis.
